ovdesc.p: Configure APIs which enable user defined handling of restrictions on account and customer.

desc.p: Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
Specifies the date from which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.
Indicates the poistion within payments processing where the API needs to be invoked.
Possible values: AccountandCustomerInterface, BalanceInterface and PostingInterface
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field 'CompanyID' in PPT.COMPANY
Specifies the date until which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.Post this date, the record will be set as Inactive by the payments hub.
Holds the name of the API which will be invoked at the poistion defined in the field 'CallingComponent'
The API should be a valid subroutine and should have been compiled.
